title: Repoman Tamashii!
description: Tohru Fujisawa attends AKB48's 19th Member Selection Rock-Paper-Scissors Tournament held at the Nippon Budokan on the 21st September, 2010 and draws a one-shot from his POV as part of the AKB Observation Section. Titled Repoman Soul!, it showcases the soul of the fans at the AKB48 event!
